Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my phone get Android 2.2 (FroYo)?  when android 2.2 update will available for Samsung Galaxy 3(i.e Samsung I5801 and I5800)... ? do you have any idea when it is going to available... Is there any otherway around for installing non official 2.2 on it...? ThanksPlease note that samsung galaxy 3 !=(is not equal to) Samsung Galaxy S... so please don't post answer that update is available for Galaxy S.. that update can not be installed in Galaxy 3
Title: Android 2.2 update for samsung Galaxy 3 (I5801 and I5800)
